subject: Olympic Games (2018)
lead_paragraph: Pyeongchang created a winter sports haven in a region long known for abandoned coal mines and steep hills scarred by barbed-wire fences, military bunkers and minefields guarding against North Korea.
snippet: Pyeongchang created a winter sports haven in a region long known for abandoned coal mines and steep hills scarred by barbed-wire fences, military bunkers and minefields guarding against North Korea.
